Name: Ninja Stealth 2
About the game: Ninja Stealth 2 is the sequel of Ninja Stealth - A.I. Revolution, now as a RPG with more puzzles than sensors. The Game: 38 new levels to explore The final part of the story New puzzles 2 different endings, your choices will decide which one you will see! And a radioactive dog as your friend...
